Cellometer Mini

Introduction

The Cellometer Mini is a PC-based automated cell counter for 4x bright field image capture and analysis that performs cell count, size, and Trypan Blue viability measurements. The most affordable cell counter available today, the Mini produces quick and accurate cell counts in less than 10 seconds using cell lines and purified primary cells with advanced software that analyzes clumpy cells and omits debris.
http://www.nexcelom.com/Cellometer-Mini-Cell-Counter/index.php
